messages.title: Standing up for the law-abiding majority
messages.content: Conservatives will put the law back on the side of the law-abiding.

messages.title: Opportunity for All
messages.content: Improving our schools system is the most important thing we can do to give every child an opportunity.

messages.title: NHS, Our number one priority
messages.content: We will make sure the NHS thrives as a high-quality service by increasing spending on health every year.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to beat crime and back the police by scrapping ID cards to get more police on the streets and tackle bureaucracy.
Pledge to improve schools by giving heads and teachers more power to restore discipline, and promoting smaller schools within existing schools.
Promises to increase spending on health every year and stop Labour's hospital closures, ensuring the NHS is free and for everyone.

issues.economy: As the economy recovers, Conservatives will act to keep mortgage rates lower for longer by starting to reduce the national debt.
issues.education: More good school places, action on discipline, and restored rigour in the curriculum.
issues.health: Will make sure the NHS thrives as a high-quality service by increasing spending on health every year.

images.caption: Standing up for the law-abiding majority
